mapper.select: Select rpt_classf, rpt_cf_nm From report_classf Order by rpt_classf
mapper.update: Update report_classf Set rpt_cf_nm = #{rpt_cf_nm} Where rpt_classf =#{rpt_classf}
mapper.select: SELECT rpt_no, rpt_post, rpt_classf, rpt_ttl, rpt_cntnt, rpt_date, rpt_mem, rpt_exst FROM report Order by rpt_no
mapper.update: Update report Set rpt_exst = Upper(#{rpt_exst}) Where rpt_no =#{rpt_no}
